hero.name: Moniem
hero.title: Front-end Web Developer
hero.description: I design innovative, professional websites that reflect your business identity and focus on details and user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: محمد عبد المنعم - Muhammad Abdul Moneim
about.description: As a Front-end Web Developer, I focus on creating professional websites that grow and assist businesses. I ensure every design reflects your commercial identity and meets your needs, with special attention to details and user experience.
about.commitment: Quality and execution are my priorities. Client satisfaction is most important to me, and I share every design stage with you to ensure the best results.

webDevelopment.title: Custom Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Professional websites built with modern technologies and best practices.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: Complete online stores with payment integration and inventory management.

webApps.title: Web Applications
webApps.description: Interactive web applications with React or Vue.js frameworks.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: User-centered design that focuses on usability and aesthetics.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: Ongoing support and periodic maintenance for your website.

process.title: How I Work
process.subtitle: A proven process to deliver exceptional results

step1.title: Discovery & Consultation
step1.description: We discuss your needs, goals, and vision to create the perfect strategy for your project.

step2.title: Planning & Strategy
step2.description: Define objectives, target audience, and prepare wireframes and detailed project roadmap.

step3.title: Design & Development
step3.description: Create stunning UI/UX designs and develop with modern technologies for optimal performance.

step4.title: Testing & Launch
step4.description: Rigorous testing across devices and browsers, then deploy to production with monitoring.

step5.title: Support & Optimization
step5.description: Ongoing maintenance, updates, and continuous optimization for peak performance.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What my clients say about working with me

testimonial1.name: Ahmed Hassan
testimonial1.text: Outstanding work! The website exceeded our expectations. Professional, responsive, and delivered on time.

testimonial2.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial2.text: Moniem transformed our vision into reality. The attention to detail and communication throughout the project was exceptional.

testimonial3.name: Omar Ali
testimonial3.text: Our online sales doubled after the new website launch. Highly skilled developer who understands business needs.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Let's work together to create a professional website that reflects your business identity and achieves your goals.
